synopsis: Osomatsu received an invitation from JRA to be a Advertising manager of JRA and wants to tell his brothers about it.
Sextuplet discusses how to promote horse riding more interesting.
Sextuplet learns about Horse racing from Osomatsu-sensei.
Osomatsu invited Totoko to promote horse riding as an idol to get his brothers interested.
Sextuplet trying to compete each other with horse racing, with twist.

After doing various things, they realized that actually doing horse racing is the best!  December comes and Sextuplet went to the racecourse since it's complete financial statement of the year.  Most of the sextuplet purely enjoys watching horse racing, except a member is in urge of doing something-- Wailing final episode to Mutsugo to Ouma no Monogatari!
